alert.note: Alert for Boone County Except Southwest; Boone County Higher Elevations; Newton County Higher Elevations; Newton County Lower Elevations (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 14 at 4:40PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Newton and southwestern Boone Counties through 515 PM CDT... At 440 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Pruitt, or 7 miles north of Jasper. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Jasper... Erbie... Pruitt... Piercetown... Carver... Marble Falls... Vendor... Hasty... Parthenon... Gum Springs in Newton County... Gaither... Mt Sherman... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
